Title: The Closet
Description: ["Satomi Maiya's first year work at the Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation. A young girl seeks the attention of her mother, who is occupied with her newly born sister. Out of jealousy, the girl hides her baby sister in darkness."]
Related: ['Adaptation: Uchuu Senkan Yamato', 'Alternative version: Uchuu Senkan Yamato']
